text: We also compared our original gene network , putative upstream regulators , and transcription factors from the extended gene network with the Deshmukh et al . data set and found three genes were upregulated ( Myh7 , 1 . 8 - fold ; Ttn , 1 . 8 - fold ; and Fhl2 , fourfold ) and five genes were downregulated ( Rbm20 , 0 . 6 - fold ; Tnnt2 , 0 . 6 - fold ; Fndc5 , 0 . 7 - fold ; Mybphl , 0 . 5 - fold ; and Tbx5 , 0 . 7 - fold ) in the persistent atrial fibrillation cohort compared to either the susceptibility or the control cohorts ( Deshmukh et al . 2015 ) .
